name: Fishing Tap Blitz
description:
With Fishing Tap: Blitz, enjoy fishing, the world's most popular sport!
Paying more money and dealing damage to fish in succession will score bonus points.

You can compete with other users for FREE
Includes tournaments and head-to-head competitions with real cash prizes (where available).

◈ KEY FEATURES
- When the square area and the fish icon are matched, the gauge on the left increases.
- Fishing is successful when the gauge is full.
- If you hold down the reel (circle in the center of the screen), the square area rises, and if you release it, it descends.
- The higher the level of the caught fish, the higher the score.
- The faster the catching time, the higher the score.
- If the square area and the fish icon match in succession, you get a bonus.

- Real prize tournaments powered by Skillz
- Catch all 100 different fish.
You can check it in the encyclopedia on the title screen.

If you have any questions about the game, feel free to contact us at: help@malanggames.com

If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com."
